content:
"""
The new stone furnace has processed some of the iron ore, and we can confirm that it has produced iron plates. However, the inventory shows that it currently has 3 iron ore left, indicating that it hasn't finished smelting all the iron ore yet.

Next steps:
1. We will extract the iron plates that were produced from the new furnace.
2. After extraction, we can check our total inventory and proceed to craft a burner mining drill if we have enough iron plates.

Let's go ahead and extract the iron plates from the new furnace.
"""

# Attempt to extract iron plates from the new furnace
iron_plates_extracted = extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, new_furnace.position, quantity=2)  # Extracting all available iron plates
print(f"Inventory after extracting iron plates: {inspect_inventory()}") 

# Check the status of the entities after extraction
print(f"Updated Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check the status of the entities after extraction
